text: Udakasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo
edit: Udakasāṭikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatridaṃ pamāṇaṃ dīghaso catasso vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā tiriyaṃ dve vidatthiyo

translations.transtext: 22. When a bhikkhunī is making a bathing cloth, it is to be made to the standard measurement. Here the standard is this: four spans — using the sugata span — in length, two spans in width. [See Bhikkhus' Pācittiya 91]
